name: Kashiwagi Shigetaka no Top Water Bassing
overview: A fishing game endorsed by and named for Shigetaka Kashiwagi, a Japanese professional bass angler.The game has a far stronger simulation element than many of its Super Famicom/SNES contemporaries, allowing the player to pick specific lures and fishing equipment and fish for bass with the correct steps for casting the lure and reeling in a prize-winning black bass. The geographical position on the game's lake and the weather are also considerations when fishing.
